content: BX 4-IF-22 Cordless concrete nailer (IF edition) Nuron battery-powered cordless nailer for fastening drywall track and light-duty materials to concrete, steel, and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Developed for drywall contractors – battery-powered, our next generation nailer helps you lay track without the noise, recoil, maintenance, costs, and user certifications of gas-actuated fastening Uncompromised cordless performance – drive up to 1000 nails per hour thanks to revolutionary Nuron batteries and the more efficient brushless motor Smart features – nail refill indicator, automatic tool priming upon pick-up, and active troubleshooting via the ON!Track app help reduce downtime on site Engineered for better handling – balanced grip, short stroke, and LED light help you work more comfortably when driving hundreds of nails per day More adaptable fastening – angled magazines for improved accessibility, and detachable magazines in different sizes for increased application range Applications Fastening wall ties/brick ties to concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening membranes, mesh and sheeting to concrete Fastening cables and conduits to concrete and steel (optional ME nailer nose recommended) Fastening drywall track to concrete and steel (max. nail length 39 mm) Fastening drywall track to concrete and steel (max. nail length 1-5/8”) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 18.7 x 5.9 x 15.2 in Fastener Intake: Nails on strip Rated voltage: 21.6 V Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 18.7 x 5.9 x 15.2 in | Fastener Intake | Nails on strip | Rated voltage | 21.6 V ### ITEMS- 3907765 -
